publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2907 Mr Keith Harding: Carleton Primary School in Glenrothes-That the Parliament congratulates headteacher Linda Donnelly and the staff and pupils at Carleton Primary School in Glenrothes, Fife, on achieving a very successful report from Her Majesty's Inspectorate of Education, which identified a number of the school's strengths including its ethos, effective leadership, development of staff and the management of its devolved finances. Supported by: Mr Brian Monteith*

S1M-2907 Mr Keith Harding: Carleton Primary School in Glenrothes—That the Parliament congratulates headteacher Linda Donnelly and the staff and pupils at Carleton Primary School in Glenrothes, Fife, on achieving a very successful report from Her Majesty’s Inspectorate of Education, which identified a number of the school’s strengths including its ethos, effective leadership, development of staff and the management of its devolved finances. Supported by: Mr Brian Monteith
S1M-2907 Carleton Primary School in Glenrothes (lodged on 14 March 2002) Murdo Fraser*
S1M-2907 Carleton Primary School in Glenrothes (lodged on 14 March 2002) Alex Johnstone*
S1M-2907 Carleton Primary School in Glenrothes (lodged on 14 March 2002) Tricia Marwick*
S1M-2907 Carleton Primary School in Glenrothes (lodged on 14 March 2002) Mr Keith Raffan*
S1M-2907 Carleton Primary School in Glenrothes (lodged on 14 March 2002) Scott Barrie*
